DriveX portrait "Submit the required permissions" “DriveX app collects location data to enable for the trip route saving function to work correctly, as well as calculating mileage and fuel consumption data, even when the app is closed or not in use.” "Without this permission, DriveX will not be able to record a route" Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer DriveX Drive Expense Manager Navigation header Settings Save Attach receipt You can attach photo of the receipt Volume Amount Mileage Date TODO Map My Car My car Reminders Trips Statistics Settings About the application Map Start Stop Delete Select a date Enter current mileage Enter fuel volume Enter the refueling fee Add Add payment Payment purpose Finish trip Start trip //SettingFragment Units volume liters Gallons Fuel consumption Notifications Other Tire pressure notification Vibration on notification Currency selection Unit of distance launch sound Dark theme Push notifications Country Day of notification 12.00 22 Time of notification Car model liter / 100 km liter /100 mile gallon / 100 km gallon /100 mile Km. //ServiceActivity Please add current repair data Service Please add the current mileage value Please add the cost of current repairs //FuelActivity Refueling Information about the selected refueling: "Please add the data of the current refueling" Buying Shopping
Information about the selected purchase: Please add information about your purchase Payment Payments Information about the selected payment: Please add your payment information: Category: Please add the current mileage value: Please add the fuel filling volume: Please state the cost: Repare description Please, select type of rapare Reset Apply filters reset Description Edit and re-save Make a new photo Trip details Total time Avg speed Top speed Distance, km City fuel consumption Highway fuel consumption Insufficient data This is my ride route / Sent using the DriveX app all period day week month 3 months year Total expenses for Payment costs Shopping costs Service costs Fuel costs Filters Trip written… //INFO FRAGMENT Expense accounting Create reminders Recording routes DriveX is the financial manager for your car. Find out how much your car is spending on fuel, service, purchases, and payments. In the app, you can see monthly expenses by category, as well as graphical and text display of expenses. DriveX helps in managing reminders for regular car services and expenses, such as service, oil change monitoring, maintenance inspections, car wash reminders, trip reminders, shopping reminders and other categories of reminders. Stay informed about your journeys. This app allows you to record the route, duration, average speed, and time of each of your trips, and save this data in your trip history. Year Month //NOTIFICATION_FRAGMENT What can I remind you of? Repair Trip Car Wash Tire fitting Diagnostic Insurance Renew license Oil change Tech inspection Other Reminder Add reminder details Select reminder date Select reminder time Created reminder Continue without reminder description?
